name: AGS Yahtzee 2
description:
What you get:

- Play alone or with up to 4 palyers in lokal multiplayer
- Play the old classic one column game or play with up to four columns
- 10+ different game modes with new additions
- Customize your game by changing the basic rules
- Create your own tournament
- Highscorelists (TOP- and BOTTOM-Score) for every game mode and tournament you create
- Live highscore position (taking the score of the respective players into account)
- Many many statistics
